title: Dydrogesterone
summary: Dydrogesterone, sold under the brand name Duphaston,Dydroboon(Mankind Pharma Ltd , Dydrofem, Zuviston (Zuventus healthcare Ltd),  Divatrone (Jagsonpal Pharmaceutical Ltd.) and Femoston (as Menopausal Hormone Therapy), is a progestin medication which is used for a variety of indications, including threatened or recurrent miscarriage during pregnancy, dysfunctional bleeding, infertility due to luteal insufficiency, dysmenorrhea, endometriosis, secondary amenorrhea, irregular cycles, premenstrual syndrome, and as a component of menopausal hormone therapy.[6] It is taken by mouth.[6]
